caption.p: Effect of Mecp2 deletion on brain levels of 24S-OHC.

Brain levels of 24S-OHC, expressed as ng/mg of tissue, were measured in 28 (PND28) and 56 (PND56) day old Mecp2-null and WT male mice and in PND177 Mecp2+/- females and WT mice. Food was removed from cage 6 hr before sacrifice. Data are means ± SEM of 5–6 mice per group. **p<0.01, ***p<0.001 vs. WT (Student’s t-test).

caption.title: Source file for brain levels of 24S-hydroxycholesterol.
caption.p: The source file contains the concentrations of brain (ng/g) 24S-OHC in individual wild type and Mecp2-null male mice on PND28 and PND56 and WT and Mecp2+/- females on PND177. Each mice is identified by the ear tag number.
